alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:25PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Jackson and northeastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, Gadsden and north central Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida, southern Decatur and central Seminole Counties in southwestern Georgia through 1000 PM EDT/900 PM CDT/... At 924 PM EDT/824 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chattahoochee, or 20 miles northwest of Quincy, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Havana, Bainbridge, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Gretna, Grand Ridge, Attapulgus, Climax, Rock Bluff, Juniper, Douglas City, Florence, Jamieson, Recovery, Lovedale, Laingkat, Quincy Airport and Sawdust. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
